description: Add scipy.integrate.simps compatibility shim for deprecated API
preamble:
# Compatibility shim for scipy.integrate.simps (deprecated in SciPy 1.14, removed in 1.17)
import scipy.integrate
if not hasattr(scipy.integrate, 'simps'):
    scipy.integrate.simps = scipy.integrate.simpson
notes: The benchmark instructions say to use 'Simpson's rule' for integration. In modern SciPy (1.14+), simps was deprecated and in 1.17+ it was removed, replaced by simpson. This shim ensures backward compatibility for solutions that use the documented simps function.
